label: JavaScript
description: JavaScript is a versatile programming language used for both frontend and backend development. Features: dynamic typing, event-driven, supports functional & object-oriented programming, runs in browsers and Node.js. Used for building interactive web applications and server-side APIs.

label: TypeScript
description: TypeScript is a strongly typed superset of JavaScript. Features: static typing, improved code readability, early error detection, object-oriented support. Used to write more robust and maintainable large-scale applications.

label: Node.js
description: Node.js is a JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's V8 engine. Features: non-blocking I/O, event-driven, scalable, fast performance. Used for building APIs, backend services, and real-time applications.

label: Express.js
description: Express.js is a minimal and flexible Node.js web application framework. Features: routing, middleware support, easy integration with databases. Used for building RESTful APIs and server-side applications.

label: MongoDB
description: MongoDB is a NoSQL database that stores data in JSON-like documents. Features: flexible schema, high performance, horizontal scaling, replication. Used for modern web applications, real-time analytics, and large-scale data storage.

label: React.js
description: React.js is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces. Features: component-based architecture, virtual DOM, reusable UI components, fast rendering. Used to create dynamic, interactive, and responsive web applications.

label: PostgreSQL
description: PostgreSQL is an advanced open-source relational database. Features: ACID compliance, extensible, supports JSON and complex queries. Used for structured data, complex transactions, and enterprise-grade applications.

label: MySQL
description: MySQL is a widely used open-source relational database. Features: reliability, scalability, ACID compliance, wide community support. Used for web applications, content management systems, and online services.

label: Redis
description: Redis is an in-memory data store used as a database, cache, and message broker. Features: ultra-fast performance, persistence, pub/sub, data structures. Used for caching, real-time analytics, and messaging systems.

label: Microsoft SQL Server
description: Microsoft SQL Server is a relational database management system. Features: ACID transactions, advanced security, analytics, reporting services. Used for enterprise applications, structured data storage, and business intelligence.

label: Microsoft Azure
description: Microsoft Azure is a cloud computing platform. Features: virtual machines, app services, databases, AI & analytics tools. Used for deploying, managing, and scaling applications in the cloud.

label: Java
description: Java is a high-level, class-based, object-oriented programming language. Features: platform independence, multithreading, strong typing, robust libraries. Used for backend systems, enterprise applications, and Android development.

label: Figma
description: Figma is a web-based UI/UX design tool. Features: collaborative design, prototyping, vector editing, design systems. Used for designing interfaces, prototypes, and collaborative UI workflows.
